official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for coverage of rural emergency medical access services under the Medicare program, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rural Hospital Freedom and Flexibility Act of 2018
subjects: Emergency medical services and trauma care

summary.text:
Rural Hospital Freedom and Flexibility Act of 2018

This bill establishes several requirements under Medicare regarding certified rural emergency access centers, including payment, certification, and participation requirements.
